content: sweet oddity art kissing fish crochet pattern https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart copyright 2019 of sweet oddity art all rights reserved you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any form sweet oddity art 1 pattern details size 12 inches from bottom of fin to top of head with weight 4 yarn and a 3 25 mm hook skill level needed intermediate- suitable for novice crocheters requires patience and precisions when assembling the fish and basic crochet skills contact info if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me i will get back to you within 24 hours sweetoddityart@gmail com https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart materials needed yarn worsted weight #4 approximately 150g of main color approximately 50g of accent color color a solid color of choice color b variegated color of choice c pink d mint color e coral hook size d hook or 3 25 mm 30 mm galaxy eyes can be purchased at sun catcher craft eyes scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch inc3= 3 single_crochet in the same stitch single_crochet= single_crochet stitch f/o= fasten_off sl= slip_stitch double_crochet= double_crochet stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head and body lips make 2 with color c 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12 do not f/o 2nd piece place both pieces together to look like a figure 8 make 3 single_crochet on both pieces to connect them together start crocheting 9 single_crochet on the 1st lip make 9 more single_crochet around the 2nd lip = 18 3 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 sweet oddity art 3 sweet oddity art 4 continuing with the body change to color a 1 single_crochet in each st around 2 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 3 single_crochet in each st around 4 2 single_crochet increase x 6= 24 5 single_crochet in each st around 6 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 30 7 single_crochet in each st around with an additional 2 single_crochet you are not increasing you are moving the stitch marker work 2 extra single_crochet and in the very next stitch start the next round 8 2 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 36 9 3 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 42 10 4 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 48 11 5 single_crochet increase x 6 12 single_crochet= 54 12
